title: ICAI Invites Comments on Exposure Draft of Information Systems Audit Standards (ISAS)
content:
# ICAI Invites Comments on Exposure Draft of Information Systems Audit Standards (ISAS)

Ek important update hai. The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ne Information Systems Audit Standards (ISAS) ke Exposure Draft par comments invite kiye hain, effective aaj se.

This move is spearheaded by the Digital Accounting and Assurance Board (DAAB) of ICAI, aiming to gather valuable feedback from stakeholders. This is crucial for refining the standards that will govern information systems audits in the future.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://www.icai.org/category/announcements)

*Published on: 26 December 2025*
